code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:{name:'',uid:'',game_ids:[],timestamp:'',email:''}};var userSlice=createSlice({name:'activeUser',initialState:initialState,reducers:{changeUser:function changeUser(state,action){state.value=action.payload;},resetUser:function resetUser(state){state.value=initialState.value;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,changeUser=_userSlice$actions.changeUser,resetUser=_userSlice$actions.resetUser;export{changeUser,resetUser};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.activeUser.value;};export default userSlice.reducer;
